language.name: en
language.title: Credits
language.subtitle: the people behind openamq
language.content:
The Producer ************ - John O'Hara
The Director ************ - Pieter Hintjens
The Cast in Alphabetical Order ****************************** - Mark Atwell - Gustavo Broos - Rakan El-Khalil - Martin Lucina - Jonathan Schultz - Stewie Stewart - James Strachan - Martin Sustrik

Special Effects *************** - GNU tools and languages - iMatix tools and languages - Apache Foundation's Portable Runtime - Sleepycat Software's Berkeley Database
